subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$482,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://skelansyards.com/
